TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit GregorianCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 表示公历。

span.span: Represents the Gregorian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公历日历识别两个纪元：B.C.The Gregorian calendar recognizes two eras: B.C. 建和公元或or B.C.E., and A.D. or C.E.or C.E. 此实现类识别当前纪元 （公元This implementation of the class recognizes only the current era (A.D. 或公元）。or C.E.). > [!NOTE] > 有关使用信息类和其他日历.NET Framework 中的类，请参阅[使用日历](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 用公历日历闰年被指的年份，则可被 4，除非它是整除 100。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a year that is evenly divisible by 4, unless it is divisible by 100. 但是，被 400 整除的年份是闰年。However, years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 例如，1900 年不是闰年，但 2000 年。For example, the year 1900 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was. 常见的一 365 年天，闰年 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 公历日历具有 12 个月 28 至 31 天内使用：年 1 月 （31 天）、 年 2 月 (28 或 29 天)、 年 3 月 （31 天）、 年 4 月 （30 天）、 5 月 （31 天）、 年 6 月 （30 天）、 年 7 月 （31 天）、 年 8 月 （31 天）、 年 9 月 （30 天）、 年 10 月 （31 天）、 年 11 月 （30 天） 和年 12 月 （31 天）。The Gregorian calendar has 12 months with 28 to 31 days each: January (31 days), February (28 or 29 days), March (31 days), April (30 days), May (31 days), June (30 days), July (31 days), August (31 days), September (30 days), October (31 days), November (30 days), and December (31 days). 2 月有 29 天在闰年和 28 在平年。February has 29 days during leap years and 28 during common years. > [!IMPORTANT] > 默认情况下，所有和值 express 中公历日期和时间。By default, all and values express dates and times in the Gregorian calendar. 公历日历开发以替换罗马儒略历 (表示通过类) 上，为公元 1582 年 10 月 15 少量的区域性中首次引入。The Gregorian calendar was developed as a replacement for the Julian calendar (which is represented by the class) and was first introduced in a small number of cultures on October 15, 1582. 时使用的历史日期的区域性的采用公历日历以来，应使用原始的日历，如果它是.NET Framework 中可用。When working with historic dates that precede a culture's adoption of the Gregorian calendar, you should use the original calendar if it is available in the .NET Framework. 例如，丹麦从更改罗马儒略历为公历年 2 月 19 （在罗马儒略历） 或 3 月 1 日 （公历） 的 1700年上。For example, Denmark changed from the Julian calendar to the Gregorian calendar on February 19 (in the Julian calendar) or March 1 (in the Gregorian calendar) of 1700. 在这种情况下，对于之前采用公历日期，应使用罗马儒略历。In this case, for dates before the adoption of the Gregorian calendar, you should use the Julian calendar. 但请注意，没有区域性提供了对内部函数支持类。However, note that no culture offers intrinsic support for the class. 必须使用作为独立日历类。You must use the class as a standalone calendar. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用日历](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For more information, see [Working with calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 下面的示例说明了 1700 年 2 月 18，罗马儒略历，即罗马儒略历正式丹麦中使用的最后一天中为早于 1700 公历年 3 月 1，一天。The following example illustrates that February 18, 1700 in the Julian calendar, which is the last day the Julian calendar was officially used in Denmark, is one day earlier than March 1, 1700 in the Gregorian calendar. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.gregoriancalendar.class/cs/minimum1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.gregoriancalendar.class/vb/minimum1.vb#1)] 每个支持一组的日历。Each supports a set of calendars. 属性返回区域性的默认日历和属性返回一个数组，包含所有支持的区域性的日历。The property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture. 若要更改使用的日历，该应用程序可以设置属性设置为一个新。To change the calendar used by a , the application can set the property to a new . 仅当将忽略缩写的纪元名称中的标点中选择和区域性使用"公元" ignores punctuation in abbreviated era names, only if the is selected in and the culture uses "A.D." 作为纪元名称，即"公元"as the era name, that is, "A.D." 等效于"AD"。is equivalent to "AD". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示才日历为公历和区域性使用纪元名称"公元"忽略标点符号纪元名称中的。The following code example shows that ignores the punctuation in the era name, only if the calendar is Gregorian and the culture uses the era name "A.D.". [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra/CPP/gregorian_getera.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra/CS/gregorian_getera.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra/VB/gregorian_getera.vb#1)]

param.name: time
param.span: 将向其添加月数的 。

span.span: The to which to add months.

param.name: months
param.span: 要添加的月数。

span.span: The number of months to add.

summary.span: 返回与指定 相距指定月数的 。

span.span: Returns a that is the specified number of months away from the specified .

returns.span: 将指定月数添加到指定的 中时得到的 。

span.span: The that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所产生的日部分如果结果的日期不是结果生成的年的月份中的有效日期影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它已更改为生成的年在生成每月最后一个有效的日期。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 所生成的年份部分受影响，如果结果的月份之外的指定年份。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此实现支持仅为当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果生成的年之外的指定纪元，且引发。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 所生成的时间的日部分保持不变，与指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，如果指定的月份是 10 月，包含 31 天，指定的日期是该月 31 日和的值`months`参数为 6，生成的年是一个多个指定的年份，生成的月份是年 4 月，并生成 day 为 30 天，即在年 4 月的最后一天。For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the 31st day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the 30th day, which is the last day in April. 如果的值`months`参数为负，从而早于指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 所返回的属性值始终等于。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以保留的属性`time`参数通过调用方法，如以下示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的多个组件的值根据公历。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Gregorian calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/CPP/gregoriancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/CS/gregoriancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/VB/gregoriancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所产生的日部分如果结果的日期不是结果生成的年的月份中的有效日期影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它已更改为生成的年在生成每月最后一个有效的日期。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 所生成的月份部分保持不变，与指定。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 此实现支持仅为当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果生成的年之外的指定纪元，且引发。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 所生成的时间的日部分保持不变，与指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，年 2 月有 28 天，但在它时有 29 天闰年。For example, February has 28 days, except during leap years when it has 29 days. 如果指定的日期是闰年年 2 月 29 日和的值`years`为 1，则得到的日期将在下一 2 年月 28 日。If the specified date is the 29th day of February in a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date will be the 28th day of February in the following year. 如果`years`为负，从而早于指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 所返回的属性值始终等于。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以保留的属性`time`参数通过调用方法，如以下示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的多个组件的值根据公历。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Gregorian calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/CPP/gregoriancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/CS/gregoriancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/VB/gregoriancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

summary.span: 返回指定 中的日期是该年中的第几天。

span.span: Returns the day of the year in the specified .

returns.span: 1 到 366 之间的一个整数，用于表示 中的年中日期。

span.span: An integer from 1 to 366 that represents the day of the year in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一年中的一天被指从一年的第一天的天数。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，对的第一个月的第一天返回 1，并的上个月的最后一天返回该年份的总天数，这相同的值返回。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year, which is the same value returned by . ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的多个组件的值根据公历。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Gregorian calendar. param.name: year
param.span: 一个整数，用于表示年份。

span.span: An integer that represents the year.

param.span: 1 到 12 之间的一个整数，用于表示月份。

param.span: 1 到 31 之间的一个整数，用于表示天。

span.span: An integer from 1 to 31 that represents the day.

param.name: era
param.span: 一个整数，用于表示纪元。

span.span: An integer that represents the era.

summary.span: 确定指定纪元中的指定日期是否为闰日。

span.span: Determines whether the specified date in the specified era is a leap day.

returns.span: 如果指定的日期是闰日，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用公历日历闰年中，被指由 4 个，但如果是整除 100 除外的整除的年份。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 但是，被 400 整除的年份是闰年。However, years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 例如，1900 年不是闰年，但 2000 年。For example, the year 1900 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was. 常见的一 365 年天，闰年 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 闰日是仅在闰年中发生一天。A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year. 在公历日历的年 2 月 29 日是唯一的闰日。In the Gregorian calendar, the 29th day of February is the only leap day. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用 IsLeapDay 最后一天中每个纪元的五年的第二个月 （年 2 月）。The following code example calls IsLeapDay for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay/CPP/gregoriancalendar_isleapday.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay/CS/gregoriancalendar_isleapday.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay/VB/gregoriancalendar_isleapday.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用公历日历闰年中，被指由 4 个，但如果是整除 100 除外的整除的年份。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 但是，被 400 整除的年份是闰年。However, years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 例如，1900 年不是闰年，但 2000 年。For example, the year 1900 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was. 常见的一 365 年天，闰年 366 天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 闰月是整月，仅在闰年中发生。A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year. 公历日历不具有任何闰月。The Gregorian calendar does not have any leap months. ## Examples 下面的代码示例中的当前纪元中的五年的所有月份调用 IsLeapMonth。The following code example calls IsLeapMonth for all the months in five years in the current era. summary.span: 获取 类型支持的最早日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the earliest date and time supported by the type.

value.span: 最早日期和时间受类型，即年 1 月 1 日公元 0001 年的第一个时刻

span.span: The earliest date and time supported by the type, which is the first moment of January 1, 0001 C.E.
and is equivalent to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管的值属性是年 1 月 1 日公元 0001 年的第一个时刻、 1582 年 10 月 15，直到没有引入公历日历和它在整个欧洲大洲以及世界各地的采用速度太慢。Although the value of the property is the first moment of January 1, 0001 C.E., the Gregorian calendar was not introduced until October 15, 1582, and its adoption throughout the European continent and worldwide was slow. 在欧洲、 美国人和澳大利亚大洲中的大多数区域性直到它们采用公历，使用罗马儒略历，由表示类。Until they adopted the Gregorian calendar, most cultures in the European, American, and Australian continents used the Julian calendar, which is represented by the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取的最小值和日历的最大值。The following code example gets the minimum value and the maximum value of the calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax/CPP/gregoriancalendar_minmax.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax/CS/gregoriancalendar_minmax.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax/VB/gregoriancalendar_minmax.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);
override this.ToFourDigitYear : int -> int

param.name: year
param.span: 一个两位数或四位数的整数，用于表示要转换的年份。

span.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

summary.span: 使用 属性将指定的年份转换为四位数年份，以确定相应的纪元。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: 包含 的四位数表示形式的整数。

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。 is the last year in the 100-year range that can be represented by a two-digit year. 通过查找两位数字的唯一匹配项来确定在世纪`year`该 100 年范围内。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the two-digit `year` within that 100-year range. 例如，如果设置为 2029，则 100 年范围是从 1930 年至 2029年。For example, if is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 1930 年，而 29 一个 2 位值被解释为 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 支持两位数年份或四位数年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 传递一个两位数的年份值 (小于 100) 导致该方法将值转换为四位数字值根据值，该值表示相应的纪元。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果应用程序提供对在支持的日历范围内的四位数年份值，该方法返回的实际输入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果应用程序提供支持的日历范围之外的四位数字值或提供一个负值，则该方法将引发异常。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 超出了日历支持的范围。

span.span: is outside the range supported by the calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int TwoDigitYearMax { get; set; }
.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.TwoDigitYearMax : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许两位数年份，以正确转换为四位数年份。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 例如，如果此属性设置为 2029年，100 年范围是从 1930 年到 2029 年。For example, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 1930 年，而 29 一个 2 位值被解释为 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 此属性的初始值被派生自控制面板的区域和语言选项部分中的设置。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 但是，该信息可以更改的生命周期内。However, that information can change during the life of the . 类不检测系统设置中的更改自动。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically. 应用程序应将此值设置为 99，以指示是按字面 2 位数字的年份。The application should set this value to 99 to indicate that 2-digit years are to be taken literally. 例如，如果此属性设置为 99，100 年范围是从 0 （不是有效值对于大多数日历） 到 99。For example, if this property is set to 99, the 100-year range is from 0 (not a valid value for most calendars) to 99. 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 30。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 30.

exception.span: 为设置操作指定的值小于 99。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is less than 99.
-or-

exception.span: 为设置操作指定的值大于 。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is greater than .

exception.span: 在设置操作中，当前实例是只读的。

span.span: In a set operation, the current instance is read-only.
